name: Soges SpA
goal: Professional training. Enterprise creation. Support to SME's. International cooperation. Management of EU programmes. Change management. Proyect cycle management. Business development. IT solutions and gamefication.
interests: Culture, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives: TA for management of Interreg programmes. Support in the elaboration of projects within Interreg and other EU Public Policies programmes. ESF-related assistance.
